description: When you want one sock that does it all, reach for this outdoor maverick. Merino helps manage moisture and regulate temperature and naturally resists odors, which is a good thing when you’re using one sock for everything from hiking to cruising the bike path. Arch and ankle supports provide a secure fit while a reinforced heel, toe, and sole add durability.
name: Smartwool Outdoor Advanced Light Cushion Crew Socks - Mens
